data.actual_result: The blocked persons name disappears leaving a gray space
data.expected_result: The red unblock option should pop up when swiped left
data.short_description: Swiping left on a blocked person in the blocked tab makes the persons name disappear but the “unblock” thing doesn’t appear like it used to
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to the blocked tab - Swipe left on a blocked person  - Notice the “unblock” option doesn’t pop up
